name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
storytext: A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Consecrated Flying Serpent

skills.name: Swirling Squall
skills.description: Deal 3 Anemo DMG and draw 1 card.

skills.name: Scattershot Vortex
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. $[K56] all <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124051]</color> cards in your Hand. Double the DMG dealt once for every 2 cards you $[K56].
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>. <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> all <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> cards in your Hand. Double the DMG dealt once for every 2 cards you <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Anemo DMG. Discard all Bonecruncher's Energy Block cards in your Hand. Double the DMG dealt once for every 2 cards you Discard.

skills.name: Immortal Remnants: Anemo
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When battle begins, create 6 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124051]</color> and place them evenly into your deck.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When battle begins, create 6 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> and place them evenly into your deck.
skills.description: (Passive) When battle begins, create 6 Bonecruncher's Energy Block and place them evenly into your deck.
